page.title: 07CUTTHORPE VILLAGE - 1
page.content: {Cutthorpe village}is a ribbon development on the {B6050 road.}There are{four Grade II listed buildings. {Cutthorpe Hall, Cutthorpe Old Hall or {Manor House, The Dower House}and a {Medieval Barn}in the Orchard of Cutthorpe Hall all at{Cutthorpe Green. There are two{Public Houses,The {Peacock}and{The 3 Merry Lads.}There is a{recreation ground}owned and maintained by the{Parish Council, where the{Cricket Club}and{two {football clubs}play.The{Pubs}and Cricket Club{play in local Darts, {Dominoes & Cribbage competitions. {About one third}of men work in {Sheffield}and{Chesterfield}some travel to{Europe, America, China and India. {Others are}Solicitors, Doctors, an {Artificial leg maker}&{Heavy Plant, {Most of the other}men are employed in Farming some only seasonal.
